name: Demonstrate Your Power ω
text: Have 4 non-fighter ships in the active system at the end of a space combat.

name: Fight with Precision ω
text: Destroy the last of a player's fighters in the active system during the "Anti-Fighter Barrage" step.

name: Make an Example of Their World ω
text: Destroy the last of a player's ground forces on a planet during the "Bombardment" step.

name: Seize an Icon ω
text: Gain control of another player's legendary planet.

name: Unveil a Masterpiece ω
text: Win a space combat in a system that contains your flagship or war sun. [Note: Your flagship must be in the system at the end of the combat.]

name: Defy Space and Time ω
text: Have ships in systems that contain 3 different types of wormholes. [Note: This does not require you to have ships in 3 systems, if the systems contain multiple wormholes.]

name: Establish Hegemony ω
text: Control planets that have a combined influence value of at least 13.

name: Hoard Raw Materials ω
text: Control planets that have a combined resource value of at least 13.

name: Occupy the Fringe ω
text: Have 7 ground forces on planets that are not adjacent to your home system.

name: Threaten Enemies ω
text: Have 3 non-fighter ships in or adjacent to another player's home system.

name: Contain Their Culture ω
text: Gain control of another player's highest influence planet.

name: Cripple Their Economy ω
text: Gain control of another player's highest resource planet.

name: Disrupt Hostile Logistics ω
text: Destroy another player's last destroyer, cruiser, carrier, or dreadnought on the game board.

name: Develop Weaponry ω
text: Own unit upgrade technologies with combined prerequisites that include each color.

name: Diversify Fleets ω
text: Have 5 different types of non-fighter ships in 1 system.
